title: My Gold Border isn't showing!
body: So I got gold this season (yay!) and I have been desperately been awaiting my gold border in loading screen. It showed the first couple games, but now it wont show. Any body have any idea as to why? I have had a leaver history (because of firewall issues) and could that have possibly affected my end of season awards? If anyone knows the issue, please reply it on this board. THANK YOU!

replies.body:
Hey Kelso, 

I looked into your account and it looks like your ranked rewards were removed due to toxicity.
Toxicity? I havent had a chat restriction in a long while...

I've looked into a couple of games linking to recent ban, and it seems you were banned due to flaming your team mates when they are performing poorly. If you have questions concerning this issue, you should submit a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get in contact with the Player Behavior team.
Same! wheres mine!!! I'm toxic as sh** but come on! at least im skilled!!! i am trying my best to not be toxic and respect them but the pleb levels are over 9000
You might've been toxic or banned for a week or 2 during the time the season ended when they were dishing out rewards
